elevationBots.wbText: The Welcome Bot is designed to offer you a way to greet new customers and direct them to the most suitable agent available - be it a human or a bot. It allows you to fully customize a welcome message and add various options for your customers to choose from. Once your customer has chosen an option, the bot will proceed to redirect them to your pre-defined destinations.
elevationBots.faqText: The F.A.Q. Bot is a specialized bot who is able to answer frequently asked questions with ease. You are able to customize the questions and the corresponding answers to your needs. The bot itself uses user-created intents and entities to specify what exactly he needs to look out for.
elevationBots.feature1: Greets your customer at the start
elevationBots.feature2: Redirects to a Bot or human agent
elevationBots.feature5: Redirects to a human agent in case of emergency

faq.typeIntent: Use one word to describe what the user is looking for
faq.typeAnswer: Type the answer that the user will receive
faq.typeEntity: Type keywords that narrow down your intents

history.title: Do you really want to delete this configuration?
history.content: This configuration will be permanently deleted. You won't be able to restore it.

item.changeTooltip: Add an option to this message
item.deleteTooltip: Delete the options from this message
item.redirectTooltip: Add a redirect to this message

tablerow.title: Do you want to delete this Bot?
tablerow.content: This Bot will be deleted from the Bot Status. You can still clone and edit it in the History.
tablerow.titleOn: You can't delete a running Bot
tablerow.contentOn: It is not possible to delete a Bot which is currently running. If you want to delete this Bot, you have to turn it off first.

redirectStep.placeholder: Type in your message here, which will displayed when the Bot redirects to another Bot or a human agent

uterances.placeholder: Type your possible user questions here
uterances.title: Do you really want to delete this sentence?
uterances.content: You can't restore sentences which were removed. You can still add new sentences.

welcomeStep.placeholder: Type your message here, which will greet your customer at the beginning of the chat
